[et_pb_section bb_built="1" admin_label="Features CTA Section" _builder_version="3.17.6" background_color="#000000" custom_padding="40px|0px|0|0px|false|false" saved_tabs="all" locked="off" next_background_color="#ffffff"][et_pb_row custom_padding="27px|0px|62px|0px|false|false" _builder_version="3.17.6"][et_pb_column type="4_4"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.17.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="72px" text_font_size_tablet="50px" text_font_size_phone="25px" text_font_size_last_edited="on|desktop" header_font="||||||||" header_font_size_phone="20px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]

Phase One: Discovery

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section bb_built="1" _builder_version="3.17.6" prev_background_color="#000000" next_background_color="#000000"][et_pb_row admin_label="Tittle" custom_padding="36px|0px|0|0px|false|false" _builder_version="3.0.83"][et_pb_column type="4_4"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.17.6" text_font="Nunito Sans||||||||" text_text_color="#959baf" text_font_size="18px" text_font_size_phone="26px" text_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" text_line_height="1.8em" header_font="||||||||" header_text_align="center" header_text_color="#535b7c" header_2_font="Nunito Sans|700|||||||" header_2_text_color="#535b7c" header_2_font_size="35px" header_2_line_height="1.3em" text_orientation="center" max_width="700px" module_alignment="center" hover_enabled="0" header_font_size="35px" header_font_size_last_edited="on|phone" header_font_size_phone="48px"]

Welcome to Phase One of your project

Please read through the information and      follow the steps below.

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.17.6"][et_pb_column type="4_4"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.17.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px"]

Now that the process has begun we are currently in phase 1: Discovery, Here we will work with you to build a general framework and theme for your website. We will also need to settle on some of the logistics involved and make a decision as to where, exactly, the project is to begin. To facilitate this, we ask that you download, fill out and return to us the forms provided by clicking on the buttons below.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.17.6"][et_pb_column type="1_2"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.17.6"]

FORM 1: Initial Contract

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.17.6" text_font="|600|||||||" text_font_size="18px" ul_font="||||||||" ul_font_size="1px"]

This document outlines our agreement and formalizes our commitment to each other for the duration of the project. We have made it as clear and fair as can be and have avoided all "legalese" and vagueries to ensure we both know where we stand. Before we can begin, we will need you to read, sign and return this document to us.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_text="Download Form 1" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="3.17.6" custom_button="on" button_text_color="#ffffff" button_bg_color="#ffb901" button_border_color="#ffb901" button_font="|700|||||||" button_icon="%%76%%"]
[/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.17.6"]

FORM 2: Design & Content 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.17.6" text_font="|600|||||||" text_font_size="18px" ul_font="||||||||" ul_font_size="1px"]

This document will give us a running start, so to speak, toward formulating an intial build of your website. Please take advantage of this opportunity to reflect thoroughly on how you want your website to be. The questions in this form are designed to help both of us formulate a solid understanding of where the project is going to go.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_text=" Download Form 2" button_alignment="center" _builder_version="3.17.6" custom_button="on" button_text_color="#ffffff" button_bg_color="#ffb901" button_border_color="#ffb901" button_font="|700|||||||" button_icon="%%76%%"]
[/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section bb_built="1" admin_label="Features CTA Section" _builder_version="3.17.6" background_color="#000000" custom_padding="0|0px|14px|0px|false|false" saved_tabs="all" prev_background_color="#ffffff" next_background_color="#ffffff"][et_pb_row custom_padding="43px|0px|27px|0px|false|false" _builder_version="3.17.6"][et_pb_column type="4_4"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.17.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="62px" text_font_size_phone="44px" text_font_size_last_edited="on|phone"]

What's next?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section bb_built="1" _builder_version="3.17.6" prev_background_color="#000000" next_background_color="rgba(0,0,0,0.84)"][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.17.6"][et_pb_column type="4_4"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.17.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px"]

Once you have submitted the forms we will get to work on putting together a project proposal for you. Depending on your availability, we may request an online meeting as both a means to discuss the details of your vision and as an opportunity for us to get to know each other. Once the project proposal is agreed upon, we will move into phase 2: Design. We will be with you every step of the way to ensure a smooth and beneficial working relationship. A review of the four main phases is provided below for your reference. Please refer to them as often as you need to to familiarize yourself with the process and to take full advantage of each phase.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding="30px|0px|0|0px|false|false" _builder_version="3.17.6"][et_pb_column type="1_2"][et_pb_toggle title="Phase 1: Discover" open_toggle_background_color="#ffffff" closed_toggle_text_color="#ffffff" closed_toggle_background_color="#353535" icon_color="#ffffff" _builder_version="3.17.6" title_level="h2" title_font="|600|||||||" title_text_align="center" title_text_color="#000000" border_width_all="0px" border_color_all="#353535"]

In this phase we will discuss and evaluate the current state of your web presence and look for ways to leverage and improve it via the modification of your current site or, if need be, the creation of an entirely new one. We will focus on a dialogue in which your needs, goals and direction as a business are put into proper context. We will "discover", as the name of the phase implies, both 1) what exactly we can do to help you and 2) what you have in mind in that regard.

From there we will offer an initial assessment that will include:

 

  • areas to be improved upon such as the general user experience and design features to enhance the impression given to your visiting clientel
  • suggested services including what we intend to build for you and recommendations to help leverage your web presence
  • a preliminary website design in the form of a "wireframe" or "mockup" (graphic document) to be used as a working model as we move forward through the remaining three phases

After the initial assessment has been approved we will form a contractual agreement outlining the specific features, functionality and layout of your website.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2"][et_pb_toggle title="Phase 2: Design" open_toggle_background_color="#ffffff" closed_toggle_text_color="#ffffff" closed_toggle_background_color="#353535" icon_color="#ffffff" _builder_version="3.17.6" title_level="h2" title_font="|600|||||||" title_text_align="center" title_text_color="#000000" border_width_all="0px" border_color_all="#353535"]

This phase is where the real creative work begins. Here we will take the information gained in phase 1 and put it into form. The preliminary design generated in phase 1 will be built into an actual functioning website. We will essentially be taking the results of the Discovery phase and putting them into digital form to give you an initial taste of what is to come through our collaboration. This is where you will be able to "test drive" your new website.

By the end of phase 2 you should expect:

 

  • a working prototype of your website with full online functionality including the implementation of any inbound contact channels and other media
  • the chance to test it to gain insights into any changes you would like to see implemented
  • a better understanding of where your project is going and the form your new web presence is taking

Once feedback on the initial website prototype has been gathered, we will move forward with refining and finetuning it into a launch ready production model via Phase 3.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding="20px|0px|30px|0px|false|false" _builder_version="3.17.6"][et_pb_column type="1_2"][et_pb_toggle title="Phase 3: Refine" open_toggle_background_color="#ffffff" closed_toggle_text_color="#ffffff" closed_toggle_background_color="#353535" icon_color="#ffffff" _builder_version="3.17.6" title_level="h2" title_font="|600|||||||" title_text_align="center" title_text_color="#000000" border_width_all="0px" border_color_all="#353535"]

Phase 3 offers the chance for all insights gained via the initial design process to be implemented. Where Phase 2, the design process, can be considered a "rough draft" of your new website Phase 3 is preparation for commercial publication. 

This is the point where we will work with you to put the finishing touches on your new and improved web presence in order to prepare it for deployment into the market. The key word here is "refine" meaning we will work together to tune in on the finer points of how best to streamline the platform and wow your clientele.

Key points addressed in Phase 3 will include:

 

  • ascertainment of key revisions desired
  • implementations of these revisions
  • confirmation of mutual fulfillment of the project's contract

By the end of Phase 3 your website will be finished. The only remaining thing to be done will be the fulfillment of any remaining contractual obligations including but not limited to payment of the remaing cost and the hand off of the website to the client.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_2"][et_pb_toggle title="Phase 4: Launch" open_toggle_background_color="#ffffff" closed_toggle_text_color="#ffffff" closed_toggle_background_color="#353535" icon_color="#ffffff" _builder_version="3.17.6" title_level="h2" title_font="|600|||||||" title_text_align="center" title_text_color="#000000" border_width_all="0px" border_color_all="#353535"]

Phase 4 is where we "hand you the keys", so to speak, to your new site and "our work here is done". We do, of course offer maintanence services and the opportunity for future business together should you be interested.

The launch phase is the moment where the new website becomes YOUR site and where you can begin to make the most of your new and improved web presence to leverage your business and the impact you have on your audience.

By the end of the launch phase clients should expect:

 

  • a fully functioning and optimized website with all content submitted and design revisions implemented
  • an excellent relationship with us here at Signal Works Design
  • a chance to make the most of their new web presence in the market

Phase 4 means the happy completion of the project but we will always be here in the future should you have any questions or need to call on us for our services in the future.

[/et_pb_toggle][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version="3.17.6"][et_pb_column type="4_4"][et_pb_text _builder_version="3.17.6" text_font="||||||||" text_font_size="16px"]

It is important to note that this four phase process is highly dependent on your involvement as the customer. Your input is vital to the success of the project. At the end of each phase and before the beginning of the next we will request your final confirmation before moving forward. Once a phase has been completed and confirmed we will not be revisiting any aspects of that phase. This is too ensure that projects can be completed in a reasonable timeframe and on a budget that, ideally, does not exceed the amount of our original quote.

It is therefore extremely important that you are engaged and involved as possible during the process. Please be as specific as you can and provide as much of the content as you can as well as any design ideas you may have This will help to ensure that your project comes together in a way that is both timely and to your satisfaction.

We are excited to be working with you and will be in touch very soon.

Thank you again for choosing us.

Very Best Regards,

The Signal Works Design Team

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section bb_built="1" _builder_version="3.17.6" background_color="rgba(0,0,0,0.84)" custom_padding="0|0px|0|0px|false|false" saved_tabs="all" prev_background_color="#ffffff" global_module="534"][et_pb_row global_parent="534" _builder_version="3.17.6" custom_padding="27px|0px|0|0px|false|false"][et_pb_column type="1_3"][et_pb_text global_parent="534" _builder_version="3.17.6"]

Get In Touch

info@signalworks.com  | 080-3926-2272

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_3"][et_pb_text global_parent="534" _builder_version="3.17.6"]

Located on Shikoku 

Tokushima, Japan 3-2-20 Jonan Cho 

 

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type="1_3"][et_pb_button global_parent="534" custom_button="on" button_text_color="#ffffff" button_bg_color="#ffb901" button_border_color="#ffb901" button_icon="%%32%%" button_text="GET STARTED" _builder_version="3.17.6" button_alignment="center" button_font="|700|||||||" button_url="http://signalworksdesign.com/index.php/getting-started/"]

[/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row global_parent="534" make_fullwidth="on" _builder_version="3.17.6" custom_padding="0|0px|7px|0px|false|false"][et_pb_column type="4_4"][et_pb_text global_parent="534" _builder_version="3.17.6"]

Made with care and consideration by Signal Works Design 2018 ®. All rights reserved.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]
